name: resonous
definition: The combination of Arousal, criticism and Joy
usage: The actor's powerful and emotional performance on stage elicited a resonous mix of emotions and responses among theatergoers.

name: bambooged
definition: When you're searching for something, and it's right in front of you, but you don't see it until you've looked multiple times
usage: I spent hours bambooged in my cluttered room, desperately searching for my misplaced keys, only to discover that they were sitting on the kitchen counter right in front of me the whole time.

name: irritharsh
definition: A person with the the vibes of prickly, insidious, red
usage: Even though she seemed friendly at first glance, her behavior during the meeting revealed a petulant, irritharsh personality.

name: complisive
usage: Complisive: The captured ringleader was complisive regarding his co-conspirators misdeeds.
definition: The combination of boasting, Joy and criticizing

name: swering
definition: Trying to gracefully leave a conversation

name: thoughting
definition: That moment when you suddenly forget what you were about to say or do and need a brief pause to mentally "refresh" and remember.

name: awkende
definition: When you wave or greet someone you think you know from a distance, only to realize it's not the person you thought it was
